content: korpokkur pattern notes this pattern was originally intended to be keychain sized but please use a bigger hook and/or different yarn if you prefer different sizes i used what yarn i had in the house already but you may prefer to use a smaller size yarn so it s easier to use materials - loops and threads impeccable acrylic guacamole or green yarn of choice - caron one pound dove or beige yarn of choice - 3 25 crochet hook - toy stuffing - finishing needle/yarn needle - scissors - safety eyes abbreviations - magic_ring- magic_ring - chain- chain - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet- single_crochet - increase- increase - decrease- decrease - half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet - double_crochet- double_crochet - 3-half_double_crochet puff- 3 half_double_crochet puff * do not close the puff with a chain patternbycashewwsonravelry body in green yarn round 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase in each stitch 12 round 3 single_crochet 1 increase 6 times 18 round 4 single_crochet 2 ch2 work 3-half_double_crochet puff in 2nd chain from hook increase single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 2 ch2 work 3-half_double_crochet puff in 2nd chain from hook increase 2sc increase 3 times 24 do not close the puff with a chain round 5 single_crochet 3 increase 6 times 30 round 6 - 10 single_crochet in each stitch 30 place eyes between row 7-8 4 stitches apart or anywhere to your choosing round 11 single_crochet 3 decrease 6 times 24 round 12 single_crochet 2 decrease 6 times 18 stuff firmly with toy stuffing round 13 single_crochet 1 decrease 6 times 12 round 14 decrease 6 times 6 round 15-18 single_crochet in each stitch 6 finish off and weave in end leaf in green yarn *first ch1 in round 2 counts as first single_crochet round 1 ch3 slip_stitch to 3rd chain to form a ring *if you re having trouble with the chain 3 switch to placing everything in magic ring round 2 ch1 double_crochet 10 slip_stitch to first ch1 round 3 skip 2 dcs in 3rd double_crochet double_crochet 3 in same stitch next stitch double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 next stitch single_crochet 3 next stitch half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 next stitch double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 next stitch single_crochet 3 next stitch half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 next stitch double_crochet 3 skip next stitch slip_stitch in next stitch finish off and leave a tail for sewing sew the leaf on the top of the single_crochet rounds on the body make sure the leaf is facing the way you want it to for your finished project mouth in beige yarn using beige yarn embroider a mouth in between the eyes 4 stitches long patternbycashewwsonravelry
